website_summaries.verdict: The Asics GT 1000 9 is a stability running shoe designed for runners and athletes who are seeking a stable ride. This shoe is crafted using advanced technologies that deliver a combination of functional style and comfort. It aims to maintain a secure and efficient ride for optimal performance. This affordable running shoe is also perfect for workouts and casual walks.
pros: The Asics GT 1000 9 is comfortable, according to many runners
A lot of consumers noted that this shoe is supportive
This running companion is durable, said some commenters
Numerous wearers mention that it is fast and lightweight
The upper is breathable, a couple of buyers claimed
Many people appreciated the quality of materials used in the shoe
One purchaser testified that the shoe offers a firm grip on paved surfaces
This shoe is also suitable for work and gym sessions, based on reviews
cons: The Asics GT 1000 9 requires a break-in period, said a buyer
A few reviewers reported that the shoe is a bit narrow
A tester reported that the shoe can be a bit slippery on wet surfaces

customer_reviews.title: Fake and Definitely not gortex don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these as they said they were gortex lined, but I’ve just been out for a walk in the rain after they were delivered today and my socks were wet when I returned. I don’t believe this product is genuine. Update: 16/09/2020 After two and a half months these trainers are falling apart. Definitely not genuine and made with poor material. I’m am running around 20 miles a week and walking around another 30 using these trainers. I’ve never had a pair of Ascis so poorly made (hence that is why I believe they are fake). The box also said they were made in Vietnam. Don’t buy them from this provider.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Baker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent trainers
customer_reviews.text: I am 83kgs and run approximately 20k per week. Generally 2 x 10k runs. I have tried all different types of running shoea and always come back to Asics GT1000. These are just an improvement over the older model. I would highly recommend for their comfort and stability.
customer_reviews.author: WXX

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable show but not waterproof as described
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable pair of trainers, good fit and I like the style and look. I'm not a runner of any description and these are mainly for casual wear, so suit me fine. However, anyone considering these for running in wet weather beware. The front upper is definitely NOT waterproof as the description states. I've been out in the garden a couple of times early morning when there is a light dew on (very short trimmed) grass and immediately felt dampness on my toes after just a few paces. If you are out in the rain wearing these expect to get wet feet! Summary: good looking comfortable shoe but waterproof description is misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Liam O'Shea

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Size was slightly larger than ideal but after tying laces a little tighter, no problem. I recommend people get at least half a size larger than they think with Asics. The version 9 is firmer feeling and more supportive. This is my 4th or 5th GT-1000 pair. Perfect for me as a moderate over-pronator. Better than version 7s I had last.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Whitbread

customer_reviews.title: not the shoe they used to be
customer_reviews.text: Gone from what was IMHO the most comfortable shoe on the planet to just a run of the mill shoe. They have widened the toebox and forefoot area, but eliminated the forefoot gel which to me is a retrograde step. They are NOT waterpoof despite being advertised as GX. Would I buy again????
customer_reviews.author: kiwijock

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and helped ease the Plantar fasciitis issue I was having. I love these trainers.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great price for genuine shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great price for this top running shoe would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Benji Pic

customer_reviews.title: A comfortable jogging shoe
customer_reviews.text: Just started jogging again and needed a comfortable shoe with good cushioning on the sole. Shoe comfortable from the off
customer_reviews.author: sand dancer

customer_reviews.title: No waterproofing as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, but no goretex lining as advertised! I’d hoped to use these for trail running but sadly they won’t be suitable in the wet
customer_reviews.author: W Constance

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic supportive shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic shoes. Perfect fit, lightweight and supportive. I followed advice and went 1/2 a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J Nash

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nice trainers and great for jogging. Shame they aren’t waterproof though
customer_reviews.author: mike sumner

customer_reviews.title: Super supportive running shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Cannot fault these running shoes, been wearing them in various guises for years.
customer_reviews.author: Mr M E Picken

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable, cushioning and supportive. Real value for money!
customer_reviews.text: Even more comfortable than expected. I run alot and this is exactly what I needed. It feels like a cushion barrier between my feet and the rough terrain. And when sprinting it propels you forward. I now realise had worn and unsupportive my old running shoes were and that was the reason I started to feel it in my joints. Just finished my first run and looking forward to the next! At the end of the day, Asics are the best for running. I've tried them all! And real value for money
customer_reviews.author: Laz

customer_reviews.title: False advertising. Not goretex.
customer_reviews.text: These are not goretex, they are not water proof. This is false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: WRT

product_meta.title: ASICS Men's Gt-1000 9 Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Ideal for those who run medium-high mileage, the GT-1000 9 running shoe offers optimal comfort and cushioning With every step. The comfortable 10 mm differential keeps the foot at a natural angle, while the visible heel gel offers cushioning and support for pronators. The construction of the upper entirely made of mesh, in the new generation GT-1000 ensures a better fit and a modern look. The duomax, an Asics proprietary system consisting of midsole materials of two different densities, is designed to provide uniform overpronation control. The excellent material of the midsole, speva, optimises the rebound characteristics and reduces the possibility of breaking the midsole. Thanks to the seamless gore-tex upper, which makes the GT-1000 9 waterproof and breathable, rain, snow mud and puddles will become part of your racing adventure, because nothing can hinder you. The gore-tex fabric keeps the water out of the shoe, while allowing heat and sweat to come out, so as to guarantee your feet ventilation and a feeling of freshness and dryness. These water-repellent properties, combined with the removable comfort inner lining, which provides cushioning and antimicrobial properties, create a healthy, year-round environment for your feet.
feature_bullets: Removable comfordry inner lining that provides cushioning and antimicrobial properties
